property.title: Button base
property.description: Defines the styling for the basic elements that are common to all text-based buttons

property.title: Button - primary
property.description: These rules are used mostly for the main submit button for forms

property.title: Account Wrapper Icons
property.description: Adds icons to tabs in account wrapper page when enabled.

property.title: Discussion List Icons
property.description: Adds icons next to username and date text.

property.title: Enable Header Message
property.description: Shows a welcome section to your visitors.

property.title: Message Action Bar Icons
property.description: Adds icons next to the Action Bar text (such as Report, Edit, Delete, etc..).

property.title: Navigation Icons
property.description: Adds icons next to the navigation text on the navigation bar.

property.title: offCanvasMenu linkHolder Icons
property.description: Adds icons next to the off-canvas menu header.

property.title: offCanvasMenu Links Icons
property.description: Adds icons next to the off-canvas menu links.

property.title: Member Profiles Tabs Icons
property.description: Adds icons to tabs in member profile page when enabled.

property.title: Sidebar Heading Icons
property.description: Adds icons to the sidebar headings when enabled.

property.title: Sub-navigation row Icons
property.description: Adds icons next to the sub-navigation text on the sub-navigation bar.

property.title: Visitor Menu Icons
property.description: Adds icons next to the user's visitor menu links.

property.title: Link color
property.description: Basic hyperlinks on standard background colors will use this style

property.title: Member profile header
property.description: The member profile page's content header is styled with these settings

property.title: Member tooltip header
property.description: The member tooltip, which appears when hovering over user names, is styled with these controls

property.title: Page background color
property.description: The background of the page itself, on which all other content rests

property.title: Favicon URL (32x32)
property.description: Path to the small logo that is associated with bookmarks pointing to your site. This is expected to be a 32x32 PNG image.

property.title: Logo URL
property.description: The web path from your site's XenForo installation directory to your logo image. If you specify an SVG image here, you should set Emails > Email logo URL to point to a PNG image, or similar, for increased compatibility.

property.title: Standalone tabs - selected tab
property.description: The selected tab in groups that are not part of block headers

property.title: Style type
property.description: This defines the general type of style in use based on whether the content is placed on a light or dark background. This may change how colors are selected in certain scenarios.
